usage.cn: 每一个沐浴在爱河中的人都是诗人
usage.eng: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.

usage.cn: 因为你，我学会了坚强，而你，依旧是我的伤。
usage.eng: You are the reason why I became stronger. But still，you are my weakness.

usage.cn: 梦想经常会变成挑战，而我们正是为这些挑战而活。
usage.eng: Dreams can often become challenging, but challenges are what we live for.

usage.cn: 长大的岁月里，我们从未变化，只是越来越清晰的成为自己！
usage.eng: We did not change as we grew older; we just became more clearly ourselves.
